Footnote_i__c.Name: Footnote_i__c
Footnote_i__c.HelpText__c: Additional supportive care is routinely required after this procedure. The maximum number of days of IC level 3 or IC level 2 that will routinely be reimbursed is listed.

Changes.Name: Changes
Changes.HelpText__c: Coming soon - a list of the past and future changes to procedures.

Section_Name__c.Name: Section_Name__c
Section_Name__c.HelpText__c: The chapter(s) the procedure is found in.

Footnote_Asterik__c.Name: Footnote_Asterik__c
Footnote_Asterik__c.HelpText__c: You are able to claim a separate fee for IV sedation / IV regional anaesthesia / ophthalmic local anaesthesia (where relevant) for this procedure.

Anaesthetists_Category__c.Name: Anaesthetists_Category__c
Anaesthetists_Category__c.HelpText__c: The complexity category of the procedure and the associated fee / Bupa benefit limit. This is the maximum amount that Bupa will routinely reimburse the anaesthetist for this procedure.

IC_Level_2__c.Name: IC_Level_2__c
IC_Level_2__c.HelpText__c: Intensive Care (IC) level 2 is the anticipated maximum number of nights stay in a High Dependency Unit after the procedure.

Unbundlings.Name: Unbundlings
Unbundlings.HelpText__c: Bupa applies CCSD Coding Principles. Click on the arrow below to view the procedures that cannot be invoiced together with the chosen procedure if performed by the same consultant, on the same Bupa customer, in the same setting and on the same day.

Footnote_X__c.Name: Footnote_X__c
Footnote_X__c.HelpText__c: This is to test if the custom setting works.

Anticipated_LOS__c.Name: Anticipated_LOS__c
Anticipated_LOS__c.HelpText__c: Anticipated length of stay (LOS) is shown as out-patient (O/P), day-case (D/C) or in-patient for relevant procedures. In-patient procedures show a number between 0 and 21 to indicate the number of nights stay in hospital anticipated after the procedure.

Name.Name: Name
Name.HelpText__c: Every procedure has a code. When seeking reimbursement for treating a Bupa customer, please include the code and also the description. This will avoid any ambiguity about which procedures were performed and enable us to ensure accurate and prompt payment.

Footnote_ii__c.Name: Footnote_ii__c
Footnote_ii__c.HelpText__c: A follow-up consultation fee can be claimed alongside this planned procedure, if carried out on the same day.

Surgeons_Category__c.Name: Surgeons_Category__c
Surgeons_Category__c.HelpText__c: The complexity category of the procedure and the associated fee / Bupa benefit limit. This is the maximum amount that Bupa will routinely reimburse the surgeon for this procedure.

IC_Level_3__c.Name: IC_Level_3__c
IC_Level_3__c.HelpText__c: Intensive Care (IC) level 3 is the anticipated maximum number of nights stay in an Intensive Care Unit after the procedure.

Add.Name: Add
Add.HelpText__c: Click the ‘+’ to add procedure to Fee Checker.

Hospital_Category__c.Name: Hospital_Category__c
Hospital_Category__c.HelpText__c: The hospital complexity category of the procedure.

Footnote_R__c.Name: Footnote_R__c
Footnote_R__c.HelpText__c: Pre-authorisation is necessary as this procedure is restricted and not routinely eligible for Bupa reimbursement.
